title: At least 17 injured in knife attack and fire on Tokyo subway crowded with Halloween revelers
content:
1. At least 17 injured in knife attack and fire on Tokyo subway crowded with Halloween revelers  The Washington Post
  2. Man dressed as Joker stabs 17 people on Tokyo train  Fox News
  3. Man dressed as the Joker injures 17 on Tokyo train  Reuters
  4. Man dressed as the Joker stabs at least 17 people on Tokyo commuter train  New York Post
  5. Man with knife injures 17 people on Tokyo train, starts fire  Associated Press
contentSnippet:
At least 17 injured in knife attack and fire on Tokyo subway crowded with Halloween revelers  The Washington Post
Man dressed as Joker stabs 17 people on Tokyo train  Fox News
Man dressed as the Joker injures 17 on Tokyo train  Reuters
Man dressed as the Joker stabs at least 17 people on Tokyo commuter train  New York Post 
Man with knife injures 17 people on Tokyo train, starts fire  Associated Press

localize.title: ハロウィーンで賑わう東京の地下鉄で刃物による攻撃と火災が発生し、少なくとも17人が負傷しました。
挤满万圣节狂欢者的东京地铁发生持刀袭击和火灾，至少有17人受伤
擠滿萬聖節狂歡者的東京地鐵發生持刀襲擊和火災，至少有17人受傷
